entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
